items.sentence: I have a meeting this afternoon that I have to go to.
We need to help our children cope with peer pressure.
Tom doesn't know that that won't happen anytime soon.
Tom had no idea what he should say in that situation.
Tom had a good reason not to paying his rent on time.
Tom doesn't want his parents to find out what he did.
Tom doesn't have the skills necessary to do that job.
Tom didn't want to tell Mary why he couldn't do that.
Tom didn't tell us what time he planned to get there.
Tom didn't tell me what time he planned to get there.
Tom didn't tell Mary what time he planned to do that.
Tom couldn't handle the pressure, so he quit his job.
Tom can't drive a car, so goes everywhere by bicycle.
